title: Blind Medicine
description: Cole is a surgeon who thinks he’s seen everything. That is, until his new partner Claire arrives. She’s a brilliant surgeon. And she’s blind.
quote: It’s not your lack of sight that bothers me, it’s your lack of vision.
altHero: Claire, a blind surgeon, feels the face of a male doctor, Cole
alt1: Cole and Claire walk down a hospital hallway
alt2: Claire holds a scalpel as she and Cole work on a patient
alt3: Claire operating while covered in blood
alt4: Claire and Cole speak in the hallway
